title: Kokurou Ou To Shirogane No Niehime
alternative_title: Black Wolf King and Silver Sacrifice Princess / Kokurou Ou to Shirogane no Niehime - Henkyou no Ji de Saiai wo Eru / 黒狼王と白銀の贄姫 / 黒狼王と白銀の贄姫ー辺境の地で最愛を得るー
status: Black Wolf King and Silver Sacrifice Princess / Kokurou Ou to Shirogane no Niehime - Henkyou no Ji de Saiai wo Eru / 黒狼王と白銀の贄姫 / 黒狼王と白銀の贄姫ー辺境の地で最愛を得るー
description:
Description :
        Princess Eder of Zels, who has grown up oppressed by the queen and her brothers because she is the daughter of a servant girl, marries the king of the nation that has just defeated them instead of her sister as compensation for losing the war. She marries Ortius, known as the "Black Wolf King". He is a barbarian king who is rumored to have the body of a wild beast and is only capable of fighting. However, on the day of the wedding ceremony, Eder meets a beautiful, tall, black-haired young man with a bright light in his eyes.
